alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bay County through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 443 PM EDT/343 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lynn Haven, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Bayhead, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Bay Harbor, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Cairo, Brannonville, Millville and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
